content: Is this <color=#ca8f50>{附近家具}</color> moldy? (sniff sniff)
info: 闲聊-对周围家具反馈-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
If I perform my special move
"Twenty-Eight Punches of the Dragon Prawn",
could I blow away all this <color=#ca8f50>{附近家具}</color> with just the force of my punches?
info: 闲聊-对周围家具反馈-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
<color=#ca8f50>{附近家具}</color> can't be used as training dummies,
so it couldn't have been placed here by a martial artist.
Which means... it fell from the sky?!
info: 闲聊-对周围家具反馈-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
